TEXT: Ghostly former mistress of the long-gone Saigyouji clan, and manipulator of death itself. She ascends the Spire for an unknown purpose...
Is this where the souls of the dead go to reincarnate?
Are you...are you the source of all this corruption?
#yReincarnations in your hand. At the end of your turn, all enemies will lose #b

Otherworldly energies, stored in your #yPhantasmal #yUchiwa, that can be utilized by various relics unique to [#e600e6]Yuyuko[]. Gains #b1 charge whenever you win against an #rElite. Currently, you have #b
charges. NL #rWARNING: Trading or losing your #yPhantasmal #yUchiwa may lead to unintended interactions with your #yAethercharges!
